description: Represent medication administration or other treatment types.

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the JSON Schema that defines this object.

id.description: The 'logical' identifier of the entity in the repository, e.g. a UUID.  This 'id' is unique within a given system. The identified entity may have a different 'id' in a different system.

identifier.description: A 'business' identifier  or accession number for the entity, typically as provided by an external system or authority, that persists across implementing systems  (i.e. a  'logical' identifier).

days_to_treatment_start.description: The date and optionally time that the treatment was started in integer.

days_treatment_end.description: The date and optionally time that the treatment was terminated in integer format.

treatment_outcome.description: Text name for treatment outcome; this will ultimately be defined by a common vocabulary

treatment_type.description: Text name for treatment type; this will ultimately be defined by a common vocabulary

title: Treatment
